1055 UC Berkeley (Nov. 10) — A TPUSA supporter and a far-left militant got into a fight. A leftist racially mocks the conservative. Masked militants tried to pull their violent comrade away from police. posted 2 days ago by PiratePatriotParrot 114 comments award share report block Andy Ngo @MrAndyNgo • 2d “You’re bleeding, white boy!” UC Berkeley (Nov. 10) — A TPUSA supporter and a far-left militant got into a fight. A leftist racially mocks the conservative. Masked militants tried to pull their violent comrade away from police. Video by @Savsays:
114 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web 23 Ridiculously Cool Gadgets You'll Want to Buy Immediately Trending Gadget Beat_to_Quarters 151 points 2 days ago Kirk gets assassinated at a college campus, antifa is declared a domestic terrorist organization, and TPUSA gets attacked on college campuses like nothing's changed. permalink award report block reply Prandogolio 66 points 2 days ago Nothing has changed.  The commies have killed their opponents for over a century. permalink parent award report block reply Bohemyth_2 17 points 2 days ago @0:42 begins some strange camera avoidance behavior. What you’re witnessing is the standard boomer conservatism that’s dying. What you want is nationalism. That’s when this shit gets stomped out. We’re progressing nicely to this, it’s inevitable. permalink parent award report block reply Metal4Freedom 8 points 2 days ago I'm all good for Christian Nationalism. America was great when our people loved and obeyed God. permalink parent award report block reply PiratePatriotParrot OP 8 points 2 days ago It's California. Enemy territory. There's no federal troops for justice. permalink parent award report block reply load 3 more comments... He won’t like the alternative where we curb stomp these fucking mutts. permalink award report block reply TheJakeFroggy 32 points 2 days ago Antifa is lucky that they have police and judge protection. If it weren't for that, I'm sure there are lots of people who would love to kill these ghouls if there weren't any consequences for doing so. permalink parent award report block reply BlackPilledMAGA 8 points 1 day ago You'd think the cops would arrest the domestic terrorists and not the guy defending himself from them. We've been sold a bill of bullshit goods. permalink parent award report block reply MySidesGoUp 3 points 1 day ago You forgot you writes the checks. permalink parent award report block reply michealr24 1 points 1 day ago Ready and willing. permalink parent award report block reply MySidesGoUp 1 points 1 day ago And lucky the opposition has families and jobs. At some point, those same authorities will have to deal with actual agrarian, heterosexuals…and when that moment comes, god bless their souls…. permalink parent award report block reply Bubbahax 26 points 2 days ago "Hey white boy" is pretty much all you need to know about Antifa. permalink parent award report block reply MehNahMehNah 3 points 1 day ago Self hating fags. permalink parent award report block reply Prandogolio 12 points 2 days ago We're definitely going to start doing that any day now! permalink parent award report block reply Seatacjoe 20 points 2 days ago To be fair, I already let Andy Ngo know that if he ever needs someone to back him up when he comes up to Seattle that I would gladly help defend him so he can do his journalistic work.   He replied and told me that it is very dangerous, I am mid age where my wrists are as big around as most of these fucks necks and sure I would be sore in the morning, takes longer to heal but all of you that have been in a worthy fight knows, it heals the soul. permalink parent award report block reply m0ntsta 13 points 2 days ago A man after my own heart. USA Boxer from 14-17. Jail time from 19-21. Hard working 43 year old man now with a sore back. But always down for a good spar. You’re doing the Lord’s work, friend. permalink parent award report block reply TheRPatriot 9 points 2 days ago We need more like yourself! I have often thought of reaching out to other conservative activists and doing the same. I don’t see why not. It’s the only way permalink parent award report block reply PiratePatriot 1 points 2 days ago " it heals the soul" permalink parent award report block reply Wtf_socialismreally 4 points 2 days ago I do believe the dam will burst at some point. It's just a matter of if that dam is repaired first (putting AntiFA down), if it happens under our own people, or if it happens under people who would hunt down everyone that so much as posted in a similar forum as anyone who stepped up. The best outcome is that Trump's DoJ handles it. But despite the labels, I remain unmoved and unimpressed. permalink parent award report block reply anotherthing 2 points 1 day ago Those terrorists are just lucky they didn't say anything bad about Israel. They'd be in for some real justice then! permalink parent award report block reply HoodooOperator 2 points 1 day ago Comment removed by community moderators. permalink parent award report block reply MakeAmericaGreat9 49 points 2 days ago I'm blaming republican leadership all the way to trump for this. You can't start the war we started, then not do everything necessary to protect the troops. Enough is enough, invade with the national guard or declare the insurrection act and get going. permalink award report block reply m0ntsta 19 points 2 days ago The way our side half asses everything is maddening. We talk shit and go punch someone in the stomach but are not prepared to finish the fight and then when the pendulum swings back the other way we get beaten the fuck down. permalink parent award report block reply MySidesGoUp 7 points 1 day ago Look at Covid. We were all punched in the mouth. Best we could do was dismiss their cancer vaccines. Well, we’re gonna have to do better. permalink parent award report block reply ConsrvspkgNJ 0 points 1 day ago Oh hell no!!! Fuck that!!! We won that fight!!! Don't undersell that bullshit and give those commie fucks a win they didn't earn. They meant for every fucking one of us to die of the Covid vax, they meant for us to still be in masks today, they meant to put us resistors in camps. I fought the war in NJ, enemy territory and we got them to back down. They opened schools totally unwillingly, they gave up the mask mandate totally unwillingly and they abandoned the vax mandate totally unwillingly. Fuck that, I was giving Governor Goofy the finger at a rally in his front yard as the NJ State Police were telling us "you have had enough First Amendment for the day" proving they were nothing but pension whores. Fuck that, we won that fight. permalink parent award report block reply Appeal2Heaven98 -3 points 23 hours ago How you can spin the handling of the Covid pandemic as a win for us is beyond me. Congratulations. You avoided getting a vaccine and gave your governor the bird. Here's a gold star for participating in doing the absolute bare minimum. They did it as a test run to see how far they could go with taking away our rights. They shut down the world for months, if not years, and we let them do it. permalink parent award report block reply view 1 more comments... You don't throw the troops in halfway. You either support them, or stfu. You are fine with complacency. In 3 years democrats are coming for everyone that has a R next to their name PERIOD. permalink parent award report block reply SicilianOmega 22 points 2 days ago Looks like the zogs arrested both the leftist and his victim. permalink award report block reply Nomad899 13 points 2 days ago Cops just arrest…sometimes to protect the victim…. Likely in this case based on all the commies present, someone would attacked him again. Save the argument for the court, they only hurt their cause by fighting the police. permalink parent award report block reply HillarysFUPA 1 points 1 day ago Ok, you can resist is you want, even if you are innocent. It won't help your case, and it make you look guilty, but at least you'll feel like you fought the system while getting raped on prison. permalink parent award report block reply view 1 more comments... Find the leader camp outside their house wait until they’re alone then… the thing permalink parent award report block reply ConsrvspkgNJ 1 points 1 day ago Yeah, being from NJ, I get what you are saying but that is a recon mission that may be difficult to conduct and not blow cover. It's just easier to watch for the latest "Antifa Day of Gay Sex and Outrage" and bring your friends so as to dispense the beneficial ass whooping. permalink parent award report block reply Maga_Gator 13 points 2 days ago if they were jewish,  this shit would be put down immediately permalink award report block reply Deplorable_Citizen 9 points 2 days ago This will sadly continue because conservatives are seen as weak and unwilling to put the shackles of morality aside to fight against an existential threat. And what has the right collectively done in response?  Nothing but an internal civil war between MAGA and Establishment Neo-Con Inc. that has further fragmented the base into too many shards of the greater whole. They funneled us all out to one spot and the mob was waiting for us screaming at us there. I think the venue was at capacity so maybe he was griping that they didn’t put it in a bigger venue like Haas Pavilion. I think there were city police, UC Police and private security. The whole lower sproul was cordoned off. You could only get in if you had a ticket. I was able to slip in a quiet entrance to the plaza by Strawberry Creek. There I saw most of the police and protesters were on the Bancroft side of the plaza. There were also riot police staged in the MLK building. When I got out those riot police were the barrier between us and the protesters at the top of the stairs on upper sproul. permalink parent award report block reply zerk0021 1 points 2 days ago 'It boggles my mind  they  even care  TPUSA holds an event at Zellerbach.
